title: The Staged Suicide
description:
When Jim Seegan was found dead, sitting in an office chair with a gun in his left hand, all signs seemed to point to suicide. Until detectives discovered that Jim was right-handed. And then, they found the cryptic typewritten note sitting next to the body...

Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
